item.description:
Suzan Lindstrom, a fellow Law of Attraction practitioner and professional writer, has invited our group to take part in an exciting new book project!

She will be tapping into the vast knowledge of Law of Attraction practitioners around the world – from Dubai, one of the richest nations in the world to India, Canada, London, Ireland, and the USA; in search of  identifying the most compelling questions newcomers ask about LOA.

The answers will come with insights from the more seasoned practitioners. You might say this book is “for the people and by the people,” sharing globally our knowledge about the Law of Attraction.

Suzan is a long-time member of the Portland Oregon Law of Attraction for Happiness Meetup group and a professional writer with many years experience. She is authoring a book for those starting on their path to enlightenment using LOA and as a boost to the more experienced practitioners. She plans on gathering compelling stories from select individuals about “How the Law of Attraction has changed their lives?”

If you would like to be a part of this exciting adventure, Please join us:


Wednesday

April 18, 2012

7:00 PM

Panera Bread in Saugus, MA

Located off Route #1 in the Marshalls parking Lot

 

love & gratitude

Ellen Sklaver

617-750-4830
item.how_to_find_us: We will be meeting in the back, closed off, room.

group.name: The North-of-Boston Law of Attraction Meetup Group

item.name: You are Invited to Take Part in an Exciting LOA Book Project
